ascension

Class AbstractUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ascension.AbstractUnit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RaeclarianManus

    public class AbstractUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractUnit serves as the basis for all units.

    All units possess several stats represented by named int fields. They additionally possess at least one basic attack and four special abilities.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nigel_Baldwen - nigelbaldwen@gmail.com
